PROJECTS

Projects

The Reel

A movie search app where users are welcomed to a homepage that displays Trending Movies, Released Movies, and Upcoming Movies. I am solely responsible for this app from design to deployment. I used Swift 5, Xcode, CoreData and The Movie DataBase API

View on Appstore
View on Github

Thinker's Delight

A trivia app where users can select a catogery, difficulty, and trivia length. Users have three attempts and thirty seconds to answer each question. Points are determined by difficulty, the amount of attempts used, and remaining seconds. I am solely responsible for this app from design to deployment. I used Swift 5, CoreData, Firebase and Open Trivia DataBase API.

View on Appstore
View on Github
